title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication
summary: Implement a secure multi-factor authentication system for portal access
description: Develop a secure authentication module that uses multiple factors such as passwords, OTPs, biometrics, or email verification to validate the user's identity. Include session management, timeouts, and password recovery functionalities. Ensure compliance with banking-grade security standards, including data encryption and protection against unauthorized access or session hijacking.

title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
summary: Provide a personalized, dynamic user dashboard based on profile and eligibility
description: Design a user-specific dashboard where customers can view relevant accounts, offers, and available products. The dashboard should display financial summaries, pending requests, and personalized recommendations retrieved from the core banking system. It must support a modular layout, enabling users to access key functions and data quickly.

title: Responsive User Experience Design
summary: Ensure a seamless, consistent experience across all devices
description: Create a responsive, cross-platform interface that adapts dynamically to various screen sizes such as desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Utilize adaptive layouts, accessible navigation, and mobile-first optimization to ensure consistent usability and design quality. Enhance performance and accessibility for users on different networks and operating systems.

title: Online Account Opening and Service Requests
summary: Enable self-service workflows for account opening and modification requests
description: Implement guided online workflows for users to open new accounts or request service modifications efficiently. Allow pre-filled forms using existing data, document uploads, and real-time eligibility validation. Include functionality for users to save incomplete applications, resume later, and minimize the number of steps required for submission.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Updates
summary: Provide users with real-time alerts and progress tracking for their requests
description: Develop a notification module to send real-time updates via email and message alerts. Users should be able to track request statuses such as pending review, approved, or completed within their dashboard. Ensure message templates are customizable, clearly formatted, and compliant with privacy requirements.

title: Comprehensive Interaction and Request History
summary: Allow users to view a complete log of all interactions and transactions
description: Build an interaction history feature that records every activity, including login attempts, document submissions, and service requests. Enable filtering by date, category, and request type for easy reference. The stored history must comply with regulatory audit and data retention policies while ensuring privacy and integrity of user information.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement user access restrictions based on roles and profile authorization
description: Define and configure role-based access controls to govern the visibility and usability of portal features. Each role should be mapped to specific privileges that determine what data or functions users can access. Administrative interfaces must enable role management, auditing, and compliance enforcement with internal security policies.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal seamlessly with existing core banking systems
description: Establish secure API connections between the portal and the bankâ€™s core banking system for data synchronization in real-time. Ensure backward compatibility, error handling, and message queuing for reliability. Use middleware or an integration layer to fetch account details, apply product rules, and process service requests efficiently without affecting system performance.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Create an independent database to support performance and scalability
description: Design and implement a dedicated database architecture to store portal-related data such as workflows, user sessions, requests, and document uploads. Focus on optimizing query performance, indexing, and caching to improve speed without overloading the core banking system. Implement scheduled backups, data replication, and recovery mechanisms to ensure availability and resilience.

title: Security and Compliance Assurance
summary: Maintain end-to-end security and compliance with financial regulations
description: Implement encryption for data at rest and in transit, secure APIs, and intrusion detection mechanisms. Conduct recurring vulnerability assessments and apply data protection policies aligned with regulations such as PCI DSS and GDPR. Introduce logging and monitoring tools that alert administrators to suspicious activities, ensuring customer trust and regulatory adherence.
